title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Biology Undergraduate Learning Experience Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Students can accurately explain core biology concepts through pre-learning materials (recorded lectures) with over 80% accuracy
Students can solve over 70% of biology theory application problems using online quizzes
Students can perform biology experiment design and result analysis processes in small-group discussions with peer evaluation scores of 4/5 or higher
Students record 4/5 or higher in satisfaction surveys on flipped learning methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
